    • Method Detail

      • addModule

        public boolean addModule(Module module)
        Attempts to add a module to the day, if module cannot be added returns false. Does not handle clashed modules - These are handled in scheduler method of program.
        Parameters:
        module - the module to be added
        Returns:
        false if module was not added successfully, true otherwise.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object

      • checkCoupledModules

        public int checkCoupledModules(Module moduleOne,
                      Module moduleTwo)
        Returns number of pupils in one module that are also in another module.
        Parameters:
        moduleOne - first module to be checked
        moduleTwo - second module to be checked
        Returns:
        value of coupling, zero if modules are not coupled.

      • removeModule

        public boolean removeModule(Module module)
        Removes a module from the scheduled modules for the day.
        Parameters:
        module - module to be removed
        Returns:
        true if successful, false if not.

      • lookFor

        public boolean lookFor(Module module)
        Looks for module in Day
        Parameters:
        module - Module to be found
        Returns:
        boolean, true if found, false if not
